name: DARKROOM - Ray of Light
description:
DARKROOM: Ray of Light is a sequel of DARKROOM. You managed to figure out where you are, and now you have to find out what to do next.
Do you want to know the end of Timmy’s story?

  • Atmospheric visual novel with elements of horror.
  • Comparing to DARKROOM, this game has more demons, and they are stronger.
  • The surrounding world has become bigger.
  • Please study the Darkroom game first.
  • Great pixel art graphics.
